titleStmt.title: Scotlands thanksgiving to the Lord for her armies safe, joyfull and prosperous returning from England.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare that our armie came heer 1641.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Blest be the living Lord, who reignes above ..."
Signed: Hadingtoun, August. 28, 1641. M. Patrick Hamiltoune minister at Cambuslang.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
